text: Tarapara tara raba take bhalobhabe'i kabula karalena ebam take uttamarupe lalana-palana karalena [1] ebam tini take yakariyyara tattbabadhane rekhechilena [2]. Yakhana'i yakariyya tara kakse prabesa karata takhana'i tara nikata khadya samagri dekhate peta. Tini balatena, ‘he mariyama! E saba tumi kathaya pele?’ (Mar‌iyama) balatena, ‘ta allah‌ra nikata hate.’ Niscaya allah‌ yake icche aparimita riy‌ka dana karena
